塐字的基本解释

塐
sù
古同“塑”，用泥土等做成人和物的形象。

塐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》桑故切，去暮，心。］
亦作“塐1”。
(1)塑造。
(2)犹言呆愣。
(3)犹垒砌。

塐字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塐； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页235第09
【廣韻】桑故切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蘇故切，?音素。埏土象物也。今俗捏土肖鬼神象貌曰塐。　通作素。亦作塑。

塐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
塐字的起名意思

暂无。

塐
Basic explanation of words
塐
sù
In ancient times, “plastic” used clay to make the image of people and things.
塐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sù］
["Guangyun" Sang Gu cut, go to dusk, heart. ]
Also known as "塐1".
(1) Shaping.
(2) Still stunned.
(3) Still building.
塐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　塐; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Pages: Page 235 No. 09
[Guang Yun] Sang Gu cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Su Gu cut,? Phoneme. Old soil elephants are also. Nowadays, the folks pinch the appearance of the ghosts and gods of the earth, and they are called Yuan.　Tong Zuo Su. Also made plastic.
塐
